publishedfiledetails.title: Awesome Teleporters!
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1]889745138[/h1]

This mod adds 3 new items to the game.

[h1]Teleporter[/h1]

- Place these around the map and Teleport between them (after a short delay) by bringing up the Teleport UI (E).
- Only friendly Teleporters or ones that have been set to "Public" via the radial menu will appear in the UI list.
- The list shows the custom name you gave the Teleporter along with its coordinates.
- The Teleporters have 3 different "bubble" sizes that can be set from the radial menu.
- Can be picked up and does not require foundations.
- Can be favorited which will make them appear first in the UI list.
- The vanilla Tek Teleporters will also show up as destinations.
- Can retrieve items from your corpse.

[h1]Remote Teleporter[/h1]

- Use this personal device to Teleport to any friendly or Public Teleporter from anywhere on the map.
- Creates a Teleport bubble at your current location, after a short delay Teleports conscious players and dinos to the chosen location.
- You can leave the bubble before it fires to only Teleport a friend/dino.
- Functions exactly like the regular Teleporters but bubble size can not be changed.

[h1]Awesome Dino Tracker[/h1]

- Use on a dino and you will be able to Teleport that dino to your location from a remote using right click or a Teleporter using the radial menu.
- Can be set to Private making it only visible to the owner. If the dino has no owner in the tribe it can be "claimed" from the radial menu.
- Dinos with Trackers can be "Uploaded" which will remove them from the world. Can be spawned back in using the "Find Dino" feature.


[h1]Engrams[/h1]
[code]
EngramEntry_AwesomeTeleporter
EngramEntry_AwesomeTeleporterRemote
EngramEntry_AwesomeDinoTracker
[/code]

[h1]Items[/h1]
[code]
PrimalItem_AwesomeTeleporter
PrimalItem_AwesomeTeleporterRemote
PrimalItemConsumable_AwesomeDinoTracker
[/code]

[h1]Spawn[/h1]
[code]
cheat gfi AwesomeTeleporter 1 0 0
cheat gfi AwesomeTeleporterRemote 1 0 0
cheat gfi AwesomeDinoTracker 1 0 0
[/code]

[h1]Settings[/h1]
Settings can be found [URL=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/889745138/1776010325132004601/][b]HERE[/b][/URL]

[URL=https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=62MYXSBT75D4E][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1008148769626544463/0E4D5C4A8428B284FD740896004FB520DAEEAD30/[/img][/URL]

[URL=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198044472964/myworkshopfiles/?appid=346110&sort=score&browsefilter=myfiles&view=imagewall&p=1&numperpage=30][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1008148769626543084/3B325920CCB6275244EEBBAF09D0E61DB32D1C7F/[/img][/URL]

[URL=https://nitra.do/ChrisMods][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/963098683831872836/388A9834AE3A30B67C4CE056D1C9C999A1A9B4AC/[/img][/URL]

Enjoy :)
